question: 工事
sourceMnemonic: <kanji>Industry</kanji> <kanji>actions</kanji> are things industries do. The actions of industry create a lot of <vocabulary>construction</vocabulary>, whether it be the construction of items or the construction of roads, factories, and more.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
